LongDesc: Tax rate is lower than standard rate.
A tax category code indicating the item is tax exempt
column5: when the item is bought for future resale.

ShortDesc: Value Added Tax (VAT) not now due for payment
LongDesc: A code to indicate that the Value Added Tax (VAT) amount
column5: which is due on the current invoice is to be paid on
column6: receipt of a separate VAT payment request.

ShortDesc: Value Added Tax (VAT) due from a previous invoice
LongDesc: A code to indicate that the Value Added Tax (VAT) amount
column5: of a previous invoice is to be paid.

LongDesc: VAT not to be paid to the issuer of the invoice but
Duty associated with shipment of goods is paid by the
column5: supplier; customer receives goods with duty paid.
